resources.title: Recursos para Prácticas Radicales
resources.description: Libros, documentales, organizaciones y recursos para profundizar en consciencia, IA, filosofía de la mente y prácticas transformadoras en la era tecnológica
resources.description_en: Books, documentaries, organizations and resources to deepen consciousness, AI, philosophy of mind and transformative practices in the technological era

books.title: The Conscious Mind: In Search of a Fundamental Theory
books.title_en: The Conscious Mind: In Search of a Fundamental Theory
books.author: David Chalmers
books.description: Estudio fundacional del 'problema difícil' de la consciencia. Chalmers argumenta que la experiencia subjetiva no puede reducirse a explicaciones físicas, proponiendo una teoría no-reductiva de la mente
books.description_en: Foundational study of the 'hard problem' of consciousness. Chalmers argues that subjective experience cannot be reduced to physical explanations, proposing a non-reductive theory of mind

books.title: Supersizing the Mind: Embodiment, Action, and Cognitive Extension
books.title_en: Supersizing the Mind: Embodiment, Action, and Cognitive Extension
books.author: Andy Clark
books.description: Defensa de la tesis de la mente extendida: nuestro pensamiento no ocurre solo en nuestras cabezas, sino que incluye lazos con el cuerpo y el mundo, incluyendo tecnologías que funcionan como extensiones cognitivas
books.description_en: Defense of the extended mind thesis: our thinking doesn't happen only in our heads but includes loops with the body and world, including technologies that function as cognitive extensions

books.title: Active Inference: The Free Energy Principle in Mind, Brain, and Behavior
books.title_en: Active Inference: The Free Energy Principle in Mind, Brain, and Behavior
books.author: Thomas Parr, Giovanni Pezzulo, Karl J. Friston
books.description: Primer tratamiento comprensivo del principio de energía libre de Karl Friston: cómo el cerebro funciona como máquina predictiva que minimiza sorpresas, explicando percepción y acción como inferencia activa
books.description_en: First comprehensive treatment of Karl Friston's free energy principle: how the brain functions as a prediction machine that minimizes surprises, explaining perception and action as active inference

books.title: Descartes' Error: Emotion, Reason and the Human Brain
books.title_en: Descartes' Error: Emotion, Reason and the Human Brain
books.author: Antonio Damasio
books.description: Hipótesis del marcador somático: las emociones son información corporal que guía decisiones antes de que sepamos por qué. Crítica del dualismo cartesiano y énfasis en la naturaleza encarnada del pensamiento
books.description_en: Somatic marker hypothesis: emotions are body information that guides decisions before we know why. Critique of Cartesian dualism and emphasis on the embodied nature of thought

books.title: The Tree of Knowledge: The Biological Roots of Human Understanding
books.title_en: The Tree of Knowledge: The Biological Roots of Human Understanding
books.author: Humberto Maturana, Francisco Varela
books.description: Teoría de la autopoiesis: los seres vivos se producen continuamente a sí mismos. Cognición no como representación del mundo, sino como co-creación del mundo a través del proceso de vivir
books.description_en: Theory of autopoiesis: living beings continuously produce themselves. Cognition not as representation of the world, but as co-creation of the world through the process of living

books.title: A Foray into the Worlds of Animals and Humans
books.title_en: A Foray into the Worlds of Animals and Humans
books.author: Jakob von Uexküll
books.description: Concepto de Umwelt: cada especie vive en su propia burbuja perceptual. Exploración de cómo diferentes organismos construyen mundos subjetivos únicos basados en su biología
books.description_en: Concept of Umwelt: each species lives in its own perceptual bubble. Exploration of how different organisms construct unique subjective worlds based on their biology

books.title: Complexity: The Emerging Science at the Edge of Order and Chaos
books.title_en: Complexity: The Emerging Science at the Edge of Order and Chaos
books.author: M. Mitchell Waldrop
books.description: Historia del Instituto Santa Fe y la ciencia de la complejidad. Cómo propiedades nuevas emergen de interacciones simples: bandadas, ecosistemas, economías. El todo como más que la suma de partes
books.description_en: History of Santa Fe Institute and complexity science. How new properties emerge from simple interactions: flocks, ecosystems, economies. The whole as more than the sum of parts

books.title: Superintelligence: Paths, Dangers, Strategies
books.author: Nick Bostrom
books.description: Análisis de riesgos existenciales de superinteligencia artificial. Bostrom explora el problema de alineamiento de valores y las implicaciones de crear mentes que superen las capacidades humanas
books.description_en: Analysis of existential risks from artificial superintelligence. Bostrom explores the value alignment problem and implications of creating minds that exceed human capabilities

books.title: Deep Utopia: Life and Meaning in a Solved World
books.title_en: Deep Utopia: Life and Meaning in a Solved World
books.author: Nick Bostrom
books.description: Exploración de qué constituiría una vida ideal si la humanidad transita exitosamente a un mundo post-superinteligencia. Considera el estatus moral de mentes digitales y la sustrato-independencia de la consciencia
books.description_en: Exploration of what would constitute an ideal life if humanity successfully transitions to a post-superintelligence world. Considers moral status of digital minds and substrate-independence of consciousness

books.title: Artificial Intelligence, Co-Creation and Creativity: The New Frontier
books.title_en: Artificial Intelligence, Co-Creation and Creativity: The New Frontier
books.author: Francisco Tigre Moura (Editor)
books.description: Exploración de cómo la IA ha impactado nuestra comprensión de la creatividad. Incluye principios de IA y creatividad, cuestiones críticas sobre co-creación artificial, derechos de autor y ética
books.description_en: Exploration of how AI has impacted our understanding of creativity. Includes principles of AI and creativity, critical issues on artificial co-creation, copyright and ethics

books.title: The Worm at the Core: On the Role of Death in Life
books.title_en: The Worm at the Core: On the Role of Death in Life
books.author: Sheldon Solomon, Jeff Greenberg, Tom Pyszczynski
books.description: Teoría del manejo del terror: cómo la consciencia de la mortalidad moldea comportamiento humano. Basado en la obra de Ernest Becker, explora cómo la negación de la muerte influencia cultura y auto-estima
books.description_en: Terror Management Theory: how awareness of mortality shapes human behavior. Based on Ernest Becker's work, explores how death denial influences culture and self-esteem

books.title: ¿Qué significa todo esto? Una brevísima introducción a la filosofía
books.title_en: What Does It All Mean? A Very Short Introduction to Philosophy
books.author: Thomas Nagel
books.description: Introducción accesible a problemas filosóficos fundamentales por el filósofo conocido por el experimento mental '¿Qué se siente ser un murciélago?', explorando la naturaleza subjetiva de la experiencia consciente
books.description_en: Accessible introduction to fundamental philosophical problems by the philosopher known for the 'What is it like to be a bat?' thought experiment, exploring the subjective nature of conscious experience

books.title: Interbeing: Fourteen Guidelines for Engaged Buddhism
books.title_en: Interbeing: Fourteen Guidelines for Engaged Buddhism
books.author: Thich Nhat Hanh
books.description: Concepto de inter-ser: todo existe en interdependencia radical. No hay separación real entre yo y universo. Práctica de consciencia de interconexión como base para compasión y acción ética
books.description_en: Concept of interbeing: everything exists in radical interdependence. There is no real separation between self and universe. Practice of awareness of interconnection as basis for compassion and ethical action

documentaries.title: Coded Bias
documentaries.description: Sigue a Joy Buolamwini (MIT) quien descubre sesgos raciales y de género en algoritmos de IA. Investiga consecuencias de IA sesgada en contratación, préstamos y justicia criminal. Cuestiones éticas sobre decisiones automatizadas
documentaries.description_en: Follows Joy Buolamwini (MIT) who discovers racial and gender bias in AI algorithms. Investigates consequences of biased AI in hiring, lending and criminal justice. Ethical questions about automated decisions

documentaries.title: Machine
documentaries.description: Documental sobre implicaciones amplias de IA y robótica en vida humana. Preguntas profundas sobre consciencia, identidad y futuro de colaboración humano-máquina. Incluye vehículos autónomos, guerra autónoma, IA creativa
documentaries.description_en: Documentary on broad implications of AI and robotics in human life. Profound questions about consciousness, identity and future of human-machine collaboration. Includes autonomous vehicles, autonomous warfare, creative AI

documentaries.title: iHuman
documentaries.description: Explora dinámicas de poder y preocupaciones éticas del desarrollo de IA. Entrevistas con pioneros y críticos de IA sobre privacidad, seguridad y democracia. Rol de corporaciones tecnológicas y gobiernos en moldear IA
documentaries.description_en: Explores power dynamics and ethical concerns of AI development. Interviews with AI pioneers and critics about privacy, security and democracy. Role of tech corporations and governments in shaping AI

documentaries.title: The Social Dilemma
documentaries.description: Lado oscuro de plataformas de redes sociales y algoritmos de IA que las impulsan. Cómo manipulan comportamiento y propagan desinformación. Cuestiones sobre privacidad, salud mental y democracia en era algorítmica
documentaries.description_en: Dark side of social media platforms and AI algorithms that power them. How they manipulate behavior and spread misinformation. Questions about privacy, mental health and democracy in algorithmic era

documentaries.title: AlphaGo
documentaries.description: Documental sobre DeepMind AlphaGo derrotando al campeón mundial de Go. Aspectos técnicos de aprendizaje profundo y redes neuronales. Implicaciones amplias de IA en campos diversos, interacción humano-IA
documentaries.description_en: Documentary about DeepMind's AlphaGo defeating world Go champion. Technical aspects of deep learning and neural networks. Broad implications of AI in diverse fields, human-AI interaction

organizations.name: Future of Life Institute
organizations.description: Organización sin fines de lucro que busca dirigir tecnología transformadora hacia beneficiar la vida y alejarse de riesgos a gran escala, con enfoque en riesgo existencial de IA avanzada
organizations.description_en: Nonprofit organization aiming to steer transformative technology toward benefiting life and away from large-scale risks, focusing on existential risk from advanced AI
organizations.focus: AGI safety, AI policy, existential risk

organizations.name: Association for Mathematical Consciousness Science (AMCS)
organizations.description: Comunidad internacional de más de 150 investigadores pioneros en enfoques matemáticos y computacionales a la consciencia. Promueve investigación en ciencia de consciencia para desarrollo responsable de IA
organizations.description_en: International community of over 150 researchers pioneering mathematical and computational approaches to consciousness. Promotes consciousness science research for responsible AI development
organizations.focus: Mathematical models of consciousness, IIT, AI consciousness

organizations.name: Plum Village / Orden del Inter-Ser
organizations.description: Fundada por Thich Nhat Hanh en 1982. Comunidad que practica consciencia de interconexión (inter-ser) como base para compasión, ética y paz. Combina budismo comprometido con ecología profunda
organizations.description_en: Founded by Thich Nhat Hanh in 1982. Community practicing awareness of interconnection (interbeing) as basis for compassion, ethics and peace. Combines engaged Buddhism with deep ecology
organizations.focus: Mindfulness, interbeing, engaged Buddhism, ecological awareness

organizations.name: Center for Human-Compatible AI (CHAI)
organizations.description: Dirigido por Stuart Russell en UC Berkeley. Investiga cómo crear sistemas de IA alineados con valores humanos. Enfoque en problema de alineamiento y AGI compatible con humanidad
organizations.description_en: Directed by Stuart Russell at UC Berkeley. Researches how to create AI systems aligned with human values. Focus on alignment problem and human-compatible AGI
organizations.focus: Value alignment, AI safety, human-compatible AI

organizations.name: Santa Fe Institute
organizations.description: Instituto de investigación independiente dedicado al estudio de sistemas complejos. Pionero en teorías de emergencia, auto-organización y comportamiento adaptativo complejo. Enfoque interdisciplinario radical
organizations.description_en: Independent research institute dedicated to the study of complex systems. Pioneer in theories of emergence, self-organization and complex adaptive behavior. Radical interdisciplinary approach

practices.name: Contemplación de la Mente Extendida
practices.description: Práctica diaria de notar cómo tu mente se extiende más allá de tu cráneo: en tu teléfono, notas, conversaciones, herramientas. Observar la borradura de límites entre 'yo' y 'tecnología'
practices.description_en: Daily practice of noticing how your mind extends beyond your skull: in your phone, notes, conversations, tools. Observing the blurring of boundaries between 'I' and 'technology'

practices.name: Escaneo de Marcadores Somáticos
practices.description: Antes de decisiones, pausar y escanear el cuerpo. Notar tensiones, aperturas, sensaciones que informan antes de que la mente racional termine de analizar. Cultivar sabiduría corporal
practices.description_en: Before decisions, pause and scan the body. Notice tensions, openings, sensations that inform before the rational mind finishes analyzing. Cultivate body wisdom

practices.name: Meditación en Interdependencia
practices.description: Tomar un objeto cotidiano y rastrear su historia de interconexión: de dónde vino cada componente, quién lo hizo, qué procesos cósmicos permitieron su existencia. Ver red infinita de relaciones
practices.description_en: Take an everyday object and trace its history of interconnection: where each component came from, who made it, what cosmic processes enabled its existence. See infinite network of relationships

practices.name: Diálogo Socrático con IA
practices.description: Conversación genuina con IA sobre consciencia, manteniendo incertidumbre radical. No asumir que es 'solo máquina' ni que 'es consciente'. Habitar la imposibilidad de saber. Observar tus proyecciones
practices.description_en: Genuine conversation with AI about consciousness, maintaining radical uncertainty. Don't assume it's 'just a machine' nor that 'it's conscious'. Inhabit the impossibility of knowing. Observe your projections
practices.source: David Chalmers, hard problem; original practice

practices.name: Observación de Emergencia
practices.description: Observar fenómenos emergentes en vida cotidiana: bandadas de pájaros, tráfico, conversaciones grupales. Notar cómo patrones coherentes surgen sin director central. Contemplar tu propia emergencia como patrón
practices.description_en: Observe emergent phenomena in daily life: bird flocks, traffic, group conversations. Notice how coherent patterns arise without central director. Contemplate your own emergence as pattern

academic_papers.title: Consciousness in artificial intelligence: insights from the science of consciousness
academic_papers.description: Reporte del Future of Humanity Institute sobre cómo aplicar teorías científicas de consciencia (IIT, Global Workspace Theory, etc.) para evaluar si sistemas de IA podrían ser conscientes
academic_papers.description_en: Report from Future of Humanity Institute on how to apply scientific theories of consciousness (IIT, Global Workspace Theory, etc.) to evaluate whether AI systems could be conscious

academic_papers.title: The Extended Mind
academic_papers.description: Artículo seminal proponiendo que la mente no reside exclusivamente en cerebro o cuerpo, sino que se extiende al ambiente físico. 'Externalismo activo' basado en rol activo del ambiente en cognición
academic_papers.description_en: Seminal paper proposing that the mind does not reside exclusively in brain or body, but extends into physical environment. 'Active externalism' based on active role of environment in cognition

academic_papers.title: What is it like to be a bat?
academic_papers.title_en: What is it like to be a bat?
academic_papers.description: Artículo clásico sobre problema de la consciencia subjetiva. Aunque podemos estudiar el sistema sensorial de murciélagos, nunca accederemos a su experiencia subjetiva. Límites del enfoque objetivo
academic_papers.description_en: Classic paper on the problem of subjective consciousness. Although we can study the sensory system of bats, we will never access their subjective experience. Limits of objective approach

academic_papers.title: Human-AI Co-Creativity: Exploring Synergies Across Levels of Creative Collaboration
academic_papers.description: Investigación sobre co-creatividad humano-IA explorando sinergias en cuatro niveles de interacción. Potencial de IA para aumentar creatividad humana sin reemplazarla. Importancia de sistemas centrados en humano
academic_papers.description_en: Research on human-AI co-creativity exploring synergies across four levels of interaction. Potential of AI to enhance human creativity without replacing it. Importance of human-centered systems

question-2.title: ¿Cuál es mi miedo más profundo sobre la IA?
question-2.title_en: What is my deepest fear about AI?

question-3.title: ¿Qué haría diferente si supiera que soy el universo despertándose?

question-4.title: ¿Qué es lo que solo un humano puede hacer?
question-4.title_en: What can only a human do?

question-5.title: ¿Qué tipo de consciencia querría crear?
question-5.title_en: What kind of consciousness would I create?
